data.title: Innovation Development Support
meta_keywords: business incubator association of new york state
new york innovation hot spot program
data.meta_description: Learn to grow your business with through business incubators & innovation development support programs through Empire State Development's NYSTAR programs.
data.text:
New York State offers resources designed to enable new and existing businesses to become more competitive through the use of innovative technologies. Empire State Development's Division of Science, Technology and Innovation (NYSTAR) programs and centers emphasize the importance of working with industry as a way to leverage New York Stateâ€™s technology strengths to produce new products. The state also offers other innovation development support resources, including financial incentives, to foster university collaboration, research and innovation.

Watch the 2022 New York State Innovation Summit video here.
